original_title: Garfield and Friends a Cat and His Nerd
overview: Nerd is the word! Jo may not be much, but he's the only human they've got! He's not always purr-fectly well behaved, but Garfield is always there for Jon and Odie - there on the couch, there eating lasagne... but he's also there as a friend. So whether Jon's dealing with a lackluster love life, courting car trouble or even being conned by a convict, Garfield is one fat and furry friend for life!
title: Garfield and Friends a Cat and His Nerd
